Condition; thresholds: max(LS, PR, PT) − min(LS, PR, PT)
If HighDelta ≥ LowDelta; driver is “high metric” (the max); else driver is “low metric” (the min)
Output: Determines which branch dictionary to use

Condition; thresholds: Driver metric is Partytime; driver is high
Output: Mild Party House; Strong Party Mansion

Condition; thresholds: Driver metric is Productivity; driver is high
Output: Mild Grind House; Strong Sweat Shop

Condition; thresholds: Driver metric is Living Standards; driver is high
Driver metric is Living Standards; driver is low
Output: Mild Shanty Town; Strong Slum Spiral

Condition; thresholds: Driver metric is Productivity; driver is low
Output: Mild Chaos House; Strong Dysfunctional Commune

Condition; thresholds: Driver metric is Partytime; driver is low
Output: Mild Dead Vibes; Strong Funeral Parlour
